title: Video Editing in Adobe Premiere 1.0 (on a 68K Macintosh) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Video Editing in Adobe Premiere 1.0 (on a 68K Macintosh) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Adobe Premiere 1.0 debuted in 1991 and helped digital video editing come to computersparticularly the 68K Macintosh. Today, Krazy Ken revisits this software and attempts to cut a mini movie!  This is part 2 of an episode arc. Check below for part 1!  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!   Watch part 1    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #84 - Video Editing in Adobe Premiere 1.0 (on a 68K Macintosh)  Krazy Ken is now on Patreon! Pledge now to help support the show and get an opportunity to be in the show's credits!   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen
